abstract: The second-quarter income announcement showed the desktop search business continued to slow, while ad prices fell.
snippet: The second-quarter income announcement showed the desktop search business continued to slow, while ad prices fell.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — For more than a year, Google has been struggling to solve this riddle: Even though people are using Google on their mobile devices more than ever, how does Google make more money on mobile ads?

headline.main: Google Results Show Struggle With Mobile
headline.print_headline: Google Results Show Struggle With Mobile
